data.name: Husk - Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Official soundtrack for Husk. Created by Arkadiusz Reikowski. Including song "Road With No Return" by Peter Klett.

Tracklist:
1. Main Theme (feat. Penelopa Willmann-Szynalik)
2. The Train (feat. Penelopa Willmann-Szynalik)
3. Shiverpeak
4. Diner's Club (feat. Jacek Zając)
5. Drawings
6. The Feeling Of Guilt
7. I Hate Dolls (feat. Matthias Adloff)
8. Caves (feat. Penelopa Willmann-Szynalik)
9. Come Back To Us Soon
10. Missing Elements (feat. Vera Broeske)
11. Lighthouse
12. Keep Remembering
13. The Truth
14. Road With No Return (by Peter Klett).
